analysis.description:
caspianToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/27/0x4c49d776c1c314d16b82ecac7ed8f70433db757d.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x4c49d776c1c314d16b82ecac7ed8f70433db757d.sol#219-229)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0x4c49d776c1c314d16b82ecac7ed8f70433db757d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/27/0x4c49d776c1c314d16b82ecac7ed8f70433db757d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x4c49d776c1c314d16b82ecac7ed8f70433db757d.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
